mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Malon, Pierre
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Had the intention of publishing the secret of two medical remedies in newspapers; wants most to help the working class who perhaps don't read the newspapers and so asks Jefferson to make the information public; has experience working with laborers and indigent in Europe; asks for no recompense and requests his name not be disclosed.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1797 June 15, Princeton, [New Jersey] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
